mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, repyer) values (#{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer},#{rno})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply =#{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT r.rno rno, r.bno bno, r.reply reply, r.replyer replyer, r.replyDate replyDate, r.updateDate updateDate, m.username replyerName FROM tbl_reply r JOIN tbl_member m ON r.replyer = m.userid WHERE r.bno = #{bno} ORDER BY r.rno ASC
